      Display the region boundaries.
      Parameters:
      region - - visualization region
      player - - the player who needs to display the boundaries of the region

      tempRegion - - whether the region is temporary

    • visualizeRegion

      Parameters:

      pos1 - - first position
      pos2 - - second position

      user - - WECui user

      tempRegion - - whether the region is temporary
